text: @realDonaldTrump Donny... You scared bro? You saw how pathetic the turnout was for your Tulsa FASCIST RACIST COVID-19 Coronafest and realize you will be beaten badly on November 3rd, so you are trying to get people to believe that the election will be rigged! How pathetic a loser you truly are! https://t.co/xsToKVd6Y3
